entries.journal_entry_description: Head over to the Medical Center and play for the wounded there. They could use the morale boost.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Play music in the Medical Center for 2 minutes to entertain the wounded there. Use flourishes.To play music, click on the Start Music icon and then right-click in the main screen. You can do special moves by left-clicking on a flourish button and the right-clicking on your character. To stop playing music, left-click on the Stop Music icon and right-click on your character.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Play Music in the Medical Center
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Mira and let her know that you finished playing for the wounded in the Medical Center.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Return to Mira in the Cantina
